Package units

package units
  • Class
    Description
    AttackMode
    The towers target selection filter : the nearest enemy, the stringest ? pick your poison
    Element
    A unit's element, used to visually distinguish and implement weaknesses
    NonExistentEntity
    Thrown when someone mistypes the entity name
    RechargeTask
    Used to uncooldown a unit when recently fired
    Spawner
    The object Spawner schedules the creation of new enemies and gives them to the game engine at the right time.
    SpawnTask
    Used to schedule an enemy spawn event
    UninitializedSpawner
    When the spawner is called without a proper wave loaded
    Unit
    Unit : an abstract class to define basics of towers and living entities.
